abstracts.cdata!:
This book is based on the Directorate
            General of Human Settlements (Ministry of Public Works)
            experience in assisting 10 Urban Local Governments (ULGs) in
            Indonesia that participated in USDRP. USDRP implement a
            number of steps in developing a Local Economic Development
            (LED). LED Program aims to help the Local Governments to: 1)
            institutional set-up to begin LED implementation.  2)
            determine the focus of economic clusters that will become a
            motor for the development of the regional economy. 3)
            formulate and develop approaches, agendas and action plans
            for LED program.
